# dataproductportal_tag (Resource)

Manages a tag in the Data Product Portal.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "dataproductportal_tag" "example" {
  value = "pii"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `value` (String) The tag value.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier.
